name: mitmproxy-logger-action
description: GitHub Action for logging HTTP/HTTPS traffic using mitmproxy

scripts.build: npm run build:main && npm run build:pre && npm run build:post
scripts.build:pre: npx @vercel/ncc build src/pre.js -o dist/tmp-pre && mv dist/tmp-pre/index.js dist/pre.js && rm -rf dist/tmp-pre
scripts.build:post: npx @vercel/ncc build src/post.js -o dist/tmp-post && mv dist/tmp-post/index.js dist/post.js && rm -rf dist/tmp-post

author: yaegashi
